meanings.definition: The outer layer of skin on a person or animal.
meanings.sent1: The cutises on the dog's paw were soft and smooth.
meanings.sent2: She applied lotion to her cutises to keep them moisturized.
meanings.sent3: The cutises on the cat's nose twitched as it sniffed the air.
meanings.sent4: The cutises of the earth felt the warmth of the sun's rays.
meanings.sent5: The cutises of the fruit were tough and bitter to the taste.
